name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
1. Course Introduction, Participial Phrases
2. Participial Phrases (cont.), Gerund Phrases
3. Gerund Phrases (cont.), Infinitive Phrases
4. Infinitive Phrases
5. Absolute Constructions
6. Abstract Noun Phrases
7. Appositive Phrases
8. Mid-term
9. Writing Process & Paragraph Structure
10. Sentence Combining
11. Sentence Combining (cont.)
12. Narrating 
13. Narrating (cont.)
14. Describing
15. Describing (cont.)
16. Comparing or Contrasting
17. Comparing or Contrasting (cont.)
18. Final exam
scorePolicy: Pop Quizzes (20%); Assignments (30%); Peer Reviews (10%); Mid-term (25%); Final (15%).
materials:
1. Donald, Robert B., Moore, James D., Morrow, Betty Richmond, Wargetz, Lillian Griffith, & Werner, Kathleen. (1998). Writing Clear Paragraphs (6th ed.). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.
2. Hacker, Diana. (2007). A Writer’s Reference with help for Writing in the Disciplines (6th ed.). Boston, MA: Bedford/St. Martin’s.
